org.gjt.xpp

Interface XmlRecorder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    XmlFormatter

    public interface XmlRecorder
    This class represents abstract functionality necessary to to persist XML Pull Parser events.
    Author:
    Aleksander Slominski
    See Also:
    XmlWritable
